Title: Relates to bills as prima facie proof of damages
Summary: Provides that itemized bills or invoices, receipted or marked paid, for services, supplies or repairs of an amount not in excess of ten thousand dollars are admissible in evidence and are prima facie evidence of the reasonable value and necessity of such services, supplies or repairs itemized therein in any civil action.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to bills as prima facie proof of damages
